caption.text:
Dear APRN Friends,

Join Kim Blanchette, APR, Chart.PR ans Colleen Killingsworth, MCM, APR to discuss recent research from the Canadian PR Society (CPRS National) on how to work with your organization to build relationships that improves reputation, earn confidence and maybe, leads to trust.

The webinar will be held on Tuesday, 15 February 2022 at 16:00 (GMT)

Free Registration Here: https://www.globalalliancepr.org/webinar-trust-me-im-in-pr

#aseanprnetwork #aseanpr #EthicsMonth #EthicsMatter

Dear APRN Friends,

Gulbrandsen - Associate Professor & Director of Digital Media Lab at Roskilde University and Mikael Munck - Founder & CEO of 2022. AI as part of #EthicsMonth
Thursday 10 February 2022 at 16:30 GMT

Free Registration Here : https://www.globalalliancepr.org/webinar-ai-communication-and-ethics-challenges-and-opportunities
 
#aseanprnetwork #aseanpr #EthicsMatters

Gong Xi Fa Cai!

Happy Chinese New Year 2022!

ASEAN PR Network Wishing you all good health, prosperity, and much happiness in the Year of Tiger!

#aseanprnetwork #aseanpr #imlek2022

Repost @aseanprnetwork 

ASEAN PR Network presents the "ASEAN SPOT 10th Talk Series: Sharing Session with the Winners."

This event aims to discuss the process and hard-work from the 3rd ASEAN PR Excellence Awards winners in achieving this excellence results.

ASEAN SPOT will bring together the best of the best in PR Practice to share their ideas, communication models, planning in building and creating their successful programs.

SAVE THE DATE!

Registration through https://tinyurl.com /AS10thTalkSeries

It's FREE but Limited slots only!

#aseanprnetwork #aseanspot #aseanpr #prawards #aseanprawards

APRN would like to congratulate PR Society of the Philippines (PRSP) for its New Directors, Advisors and Officers for 2022-2023 period.

May the new boards of PRSP prosper and successful for all the endeavors and we look forward for more collaboration between ASEAN PR Network and PR Society of the Philippines.
